mapper.insert: insert into book (title, category, price) values (#{title}, #{category}, #{price})
mapper.select: select title, category, price, insert_date from book where book_id = #{bookId}

select book_id, title, category, price, insert_date from book where 1 = 1
and (title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or category like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by insert_date desc
